name.baseName: Shelling ; Fruit kernel ; Peanuts, melon seeds, walnuts, etc. ; Shelling ; All sizes; NESPS2
去壳 ; 果仁 ; 花生、瓜子、核桃等 ; 脱壳 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了适用于所有规模去壳作业的去壳果仁花生、瓜子、核桃等果仁的处理过程。数据包括了用于此类加工设施中的排气和颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）排放的末端处理技术。具体涵盖了管理污染的技术，如静电除尘和布袋过滤器，其报告的技术效率分别为95％和90％。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1372文件，在完整版文件中第2644页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为果仁，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isElectrostatic precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是静电除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
